QuestData.Title: Minion! Kill Them!
QuestData.Description: Per your contract you will help me gather supplies for a perfectly harmless ritual.$b$bI need feathers, and horns. Lots of horns. See those shadowrunners, prowlers and heron over there in the Olivian Veil? They should have lots of both.$b$bOh! And I need olives. Lots of olives. One for each finger.$b$BMinion! Let's ride!
QuestData.LogDescription: Fulfill your part of the deal with Daglop.
QuestData.CompletionText: This land is ripe for the taking. Especially the olives. They are really ripe. And I love ripe olives.
QuestData.RewardText: Mmmm. Olives. I love these things. They are the only reason worth to come to this filthy world.
